name: logs-in-context-esm-example
description: Demonstrating automatic logs-in-context for ESM applications

scripts.start: NEW_RELIC_LICENSE_KEY=<your key> NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME=logs-in-context-esm-demo NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true node --experimental-loader newrelic/esm-loader.mjs -r newrelic index.js
